title: Holes from Fluxkit
medium: Plastic box with offset label, containing three offset cards mounted to cardboard, one blank card, and three rubber objects
dimensions:
component (box): 1 x 4 11/16 x 3 15/16" (2.6 x 11.9 x 10 cm); component (tube): 1 x 9/16" (2.5 x 1.5 cm); component (ring): 1/16 x 1" (0.2 x 2.5 cm); component (rubber band): 13/16 x 2 7/8 x 1/4" (2 x 7.3 x 0.6 cm)
Component (yellow card): 3 x 4 1/8" (7.6 x 10.5 cm)
Component (cards, each): 3 1/16 x 4 5/16" (7.7 x 11 cm)
credits: The Gilbert and Lila Silverman Fluxus Collection Gift
